name: Suffer Puffer
description:
Play in fullscreen for best experience!

Gameplay:

Incoming trash will stick to you.
You need keep yourself and all the rubbish you accumulated inside the circle!
Combining three pieces of same colored junk will remove them.

Controlls:

Move : WASD / arrow keys
Rotate : Q&E / " , " & " . "

Credits:

Diana - Visuals
Julian - UI / Programming
Yannick - Programming

Music Credit:
